mention.text: a perilous software flaw allowing hackers to hijack Internet Explorer -LRB- IE -RRB- browsers
hackers to hijack Internet Explorer -LRB- IE -RRB-
IE , which has the largest install base of any browser on the market
the vulnerability in the world 's most popular Web browser are '' spreading like wildfire '' with millions of computers already compromised
botnets '' used to attack more machines and to send specious sales pitches to e-mail addresses in low-cost quests to bilk readers out of cash
